segments.text: I don ’ t feel so good . I am feeling sick to my stomach .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you had anything to eat lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I had fried shrimp and clams for lunch .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Perhaps , but I haven ’ t felt well for a few days now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Has anything been upsetting you lately ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: My stress level is pretty much what is usually is .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you think that maybe you are getting the flu ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It seems to me like I may have caught a bug .
segments.speaker: S2
